displayName: What Silicon Valley "Gets" about Software Engineers that Traditional Companies Do Not
brief: "SV-like" companies think of engineers as value generators, and creative problem solvers. Traditional companies think of them as factory workers.

elements.displayName: What Silicon Valley "Gets" about Software Engineers that Traditional Companies Do Not

stems.text: Which decision can developers in traditional companies make or have impacts on

choices.A: User comments can be liked or disliked
choices.B: Which market should the team focus on
choices.C: Complete the assigned work with a fancy technology
choices.D: Whether or not to put off the work according to the context passed down

explains.text: The expectation from developers at traditional companies is to complete assigned work. At SV-like companies, it's to solve problems that the business has

stems.text: If you ask an engineer in "SV-like" companies if X can be done, what response(s) can you get?

choices.A: "It seems to me that X and Y are quite similar, why not do both together?"
choices.B: "I've found that our competitors already shipped a similar feature, without too much help, should we put this off first?"
choices.C: "If we can give up some parts of this feature, this feature can be delivered without any code changes."
choices.D: "If we can delay 2 weeks, the time to deliver can be reduced by 3 days"

explains.text: engineers who are encouraged to solve problems will often stop and think before picking up work, identifying opportunities for more impact

stems.text: Engineers in what kind(s) of company have access to business metrics

explains.text: Transparency is big at SV companies. At traditional companies, much of this does not exist.

stems.text: In a traditional company, A1 is the leader of A2, B1 is the leader of B2, if A2 wants to talk to B2, what should A2 do?

choices.A: A2 talks to B1, and B1 talks to B2
choices.C: A2 talks to A1, A1 talks to B1, and B1 talks to B2
choices.D: A2 talks to A1, A1 talks to B2

explains.text: Traditional companies will encourage hierarchical communication. Managers in these places prefer to be information hubs.

stems.text: Which of the following work is familiar to engineers in traditional companies

choices.A: Log into a production machine and deploy the applications
choices.C: Optimizing the build time of his application

explains.text: Companies that care about engineers focusing on solving problems quickly set up various infra, platform and SRE teams, who reduce the developer experience churn.
